faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our excursions and booking process.
faq.weatherQuestion: What happens if it rains on the day of my excursion?
faq.weatherAnswer: In case of light rain, most excursions will proceed as planned as the Dominican Republic often experiences brief showers that pass quickly. For severe weather conditions, we offer the option to reschedule your excursion or receive a full refund. We'll contact you as early as possible to discuss your options.
faq.bookingQuestion: How far in advance should I book an excursion?
faq.bookingAnswer: We recommend booking your excursion at least 48 hours in advance to secure your spot, especially during high season (December-April). However, we can sometimes accommodate last-minute bookings depending on availability. Contact us directly for same-day bookings.
faq.paymentQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.paymentAnswer: We accept credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and cash payments at our office. For online bookings, payment is required at the time of booking to confirm your reservation.
faq.cancellationAnswer: You can cancel up to 24 hours before your scheduled excursion for a full refund. Cancellations within 24 hours of the excursion start time are subject to a 50% cancellation fee. No-shows are non-refundable. Special conditions may apply for group bookings.
faq.pickupQuestion: Do you offer hotel pickup and drop-off?
faq.pickupAnswer: Yes, we offer complimentary pickup and drop-off service from most hotels and resorts in Punta Cana, BÃ¡varo, and La Romana areas. Pickup times vary depending on your excursion and location. We'll confirm your exact pickup time when you book.
faq.kidsQuestion: Are your excursions suitable for children?
faq.kidsAnswer: Many of our excursions are family-friendly and suitable for children of various ages. Each excursion description includes age recommendations or restrictions. For specific questions about whether an excursion is appropriate for your children, please contact us directly.
faq.whatToBringQuestion: What should I bring on the excursion?
faq.whatToBringAnswer: For most excursions, we recommend bringing sunscreen, a hat, comfortable clothing, insect repellent, and a camera. For water activities, bring a swimsuit, towel, and change of clothes. Specific recommendations for each excursion will be provided in your booking confirmation email.
faq.groupDiscountAnswer: Yes, we offer discounts for groups of 10 or more people. The exact discount depends on the excursion and group size. Please contact us directly for a customized quote for your group.
faq.contactUs: Our team is here to help you plan your perfect excursion experience.
